content: Maaf, saya tidak dapat menguji apa yang Anda lakukan tanpa informasi lebih lanjut. Bisa Anda memberikan lebih banyak detail tentang apa yang ingin Anda uji? Saya akan mencoba membantu dengan yang saya tahu.
Hi, Rachel. My name is Edison. What do you do for today?
Hi Edison, I'm actually a language model AI designed to help answer questions and provide assistance. How can I assist you today?
Can you sing me a song?
Of course, I can "sing" you a song using text. What genre of song or favorite artist do you have in mind?
Just give me a random song, whatever, I will take it.

Alright. Here's a short song for you:

     Sunshine, lollipops and rainbows,
     Everything that's wonderful is what I feel when we're together,
     Brighter than a lucky penny, 
     When you're near the rain just disappears, dear, 
     And I feel so fine just to know that you are mine. 

That's an excerpt from the song "Sunshine, Lollipops and Rainbows" by Leslie Gore. I hope you enjoyed it!
